string.value: Go to #bSouthperry#k and meet up with #bBiggs#k to learn more about Victoria Island, like Bari suggests.
Biggs tells you the basics of Victoria Island and advises that you speak with Olaf once you land there. Okay, gotta remember that. #bLith Harbor#k. Meet #bOlaf#k. Okay!
Olaf seemed genuinely happy to meet a new traveler and said, if you want to learn more about job advancement, he's your man!

You must be new. You've made your way to Southperry, so I suppose you're ready to head to Victoria Island, right? Making a journey to an unknown place requires preparation. Would you like some information on #bVictoria Island#k?
Victoria Island is a #bhumongous#k island! That place, along with the continent of Ossyria, takes up the majority of Maple World. I heard Victoria Island used to be one with Ossyria...

Anyway, Victoria Island consists of #bfour towns#k and #bone port#k, with Sleepywood in the center. Each town has a #btown chief#k. These chiefs are also the #bmasters of each occupations#k. They are the ones you need to visit to make a job advancement.
Maple Island can't possibly compare to Victoria Island in size. I hear that Orange Mushrooms, the strongest monsters on Maple Island, are nothing compared to the grisly beasts on Victoria Island!

Beginners that set foot in Victoria Island should be very careful. But no worries. The first place you'll land at Victoria Island, #bLith Harbor#k, has someone that specializes in helping out Beginners like you.
Look for #bOlaf#k at #bLith Harbor#k. He'll help you get acclimated to Victoria Island. He shouldn't be hard to find. Good luck on your journey!
Hmmm... If you don't need information, then oh well...
You must be new... I can smell it! Muahaha! Have you just arrived from Maple Island? If so, then I, the great Olaf, shall help you.
This world may be full of dangerous monsters, but people oughta stick together and help each other out, am I right or am I right? Especially a youngling like you, who's the future of the Maple World.
Ah, lessee. I can help you out with your first job advancement. I'm friends with all the chiefs on this island, so I know a ton about every occupation. I'll help you find the perfect job!

You haven't made your way to Victoria Island yet. It's a good idea to quietly train here until you're ready to make a job advancement. Once you are, then head to Victoria Island and find #bOlaf#k at #bLith Harbor#k.
